soft_skills.phrase: proactively reshaping the entire support process

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using AI tools to automate and optimize existing operational tasks within the telecommunications industry. While it mentions 'AI System Building,' it lacks specific details about developing or fine-tuning generative models, which are core to a GenAI Engineer role. The emphasis on configuring network functions and traditional troubleshooting suggests a more operations-focused or advanced technical support role rather than a generative AI specialist.
